title: The famous Chinois, or The loves of several of the French nobility, under borrowed names with a key annexed.
author: Du Bail, Louis Moreau, sieur.
publisher: Printed by E.O. for Thomas Dring ...,
notes: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
Translator's dedication (signed: Eleutherius) gives the author's name as Monsieur Du Ball.
Translation of the author's Le Fameux Chinois.
